text: Mu lusiisira lw’Abafirisuuti ne muva essajja eddene nga lizira erinnya lyalyo Goliyaasi17:4 Goliyaasi yali muzzukulu w’Abanakimu abaali kumpi okuzikirizibwa bamalibwewo Yoswa. Kyokka abamu ku bo baasigalawo mu Gaaza, ne Asukulooni, ne Gaasi, era eyo Goliyaasi gye yava., ery’e Gaasi, ng’obuwanvu bwalyo lyali mita ssatu n’okusingawo.
